comments:
From the newsgroup

I changed my installed JDKs (deleted 1.3.0, installed 1.3.1), so that the
preferences for Installed JREs are wrong.

I have problems with starting eclipse latest stable build (21.3.2002) and
> my
> > own workspace.
> > Starting command is:
> >     c:\Programme\eclipse\eclipse.exe -data c:\Java
> > Starting eclipse.exe without the -data parameter works.
> > So I think it has something to do with my old .metadata.
> > I am using Win2K and JDK 1.4.0.

We were not clearing the vmConfiguration.xml when we detected that the default 
JRE had gone missing and could not auto-detect an alternative. Fixed in 
JavaRuntime....when a default vm goes missing we always save now.

As well when we removed a "moved" JRE and then redetected another, the list in 
the installed JRE page was not updated until you left the page and returned. 
Fixed in VMPreferencePage and ListContentProvider.
*** Bug 11288 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
